src:
Cara Membuat Nugget Ayam Tanpa Digiling, Ikuti 5 Langkah Ini
07 Nov 2019, 03:00 by Lusiana Mustinda - detikFood


Cara membuat nugget ayam. Foto: iStock

Jakarta - Nugget ayam buatan sendiri bisa dijadikan stok makanan untuk si kecil. Tak punya blender atau food processor? Kamu tetap bisa kok bikin nugget ayam. Ini cara membuat nugget ayam enak tanpa digiling.Nugget ayam bisa dibuat dengan campuran beberapa jenis sayuran, seperti wortel dan buncis. Untuk membuat nugget di rumah ternyata caranya sangat mudah.



Baca juga: 
Resep Nugget Ayam buat Si Kecil dengan Sayur dan Keju



Berikut ini cara membuat nugget ayam rumahan untuk anak di rumah:1. Siapkan Bahan- 500 gram ayam fillet- 2 buah tahu putih- 1 buah wortel- 1 butir telurBumbu halus:- 3 siung bawang merah- 2 siung bawang putih- Gula dan garam secukupnya- 1 sdt merica bubuk- 2 sdm tepung terigu- 1 sdm margarin- Sedikit airLapisan nugget ayam:- 2 sdm tepung terigu yang dicairkan- Tepung panir secukupnya- Minyak goreng secukupnya2. Campurkan Semua BahanSiapkan semua bahan untuk nugget ayam. Dan haluskan bumbu. Lalu cincang kasar daging ayam dengan pisau tajam, tidak perlu diblender agar tekstur ayamnya terasa. Campurkan daging ayam cincang, telur, tahu yang sudah dihaluskan, bumbu halus, dan margarin. Aduk sampai rata.3. Tambahkan Tepung TeriguTambahkan sedikit air, beri tepung secukupnya agar teksturnya lebih padat dan setelah dikukus nanti, nugget bisa dipotong dan tidak hancur, aduk lagi sampai rata.4. KukusTuang adonan nugget ke dalam loyang dan kukus sampai matang sekitar 35 menit. Biarkan dingin dan potong sesuai selera.5. Beri Lapisan dan GorengCelupkan adonan ke dalam cairan tepung terigu dan balur dengan tepung roti. Bisa langsung digoreng atau di tempat dalam wadah kedap udara dan disimpan dalam freezer.Gampangkan cara membuat nugget ayam enak dan renyah?



Baca juga: 
Tips Bikin Nugget Ayam Enak yang Beda!

text:
How to Make Chicken Nuggets Without Grinded, Follow These 5 Steps
Nov 7 2019, 03:00 by Lusiana Mustinda - detikFood


How to make chicken nuggets. Photo: iStock

Jakarta - Homemade chicken nuggets can be used as food stocks for your little one. Don't have a blender or food processor? You can still make chicken nuggets. This is how to make delicious chicken nuggets without being ground. Chicken nuggets can be made with a mixture of several types of vegetables, such as carrots and beans. To make nuggets at home turned out to be very easy.



Also read:
Chicken Nugget Recipe for Little One with Vegetables and Cheese



Here's how to make home chicken nuggets for children at home: 1. Prepare Ingredients - 500 grams of chicken fillet - 2 pieces of white tofu - 1 fruit carrot - 1 egg Finely seasoned: - 3 cloves of onion - 2 cloves of garlic - Sugar and salt to taste - 1 tsp ground pepper powder - 2 tbsp flour - 1 tbsp margarine - A little water Chicken nugget layer: - 2 tablespoons thawed flour flour - Panir flour to taste - Cooking oil to taste 2. Mix All Ingredients Prepare all ingredients for chicken nuggets. And puree the seasoning. Then roughly chop the chicken meat with a sharp knife, no need to blend so that the chicken texture is felt. Mix minced chicken, eggs, mashed tofu, spices, and margarine. Stir until smooth. Add Flour Add a little water, add enough flour so that the texture is denser and after steaming later, the nugget can be cut and not crushed, stirring again until smooth. Steaming Pour the nugget mixture into the pan and steam until cooked for about 35 minutes. Allow to cool and cut according to taste.5. Give Layers and Frying Dip the dough in the flour and mix with bread flour. Can be fried immediately or in an airtight container and stored in a freezer. Simplify how to make tasty and crispy chicken nuggets?



Also read:
Tips for Making Different Tasty Chicken Nuggets!
